# availableDepthDataTypes

**Instance Property**

The list of depth data formats to which you can convert this depth data.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var availableDepthDataTypes: [OSType] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVDepthData/converting(toDepthDataType:)] method to obtain a converted depth data object using one of the types in this list.

## Transforming and processing

- **applyingExifOrientation(_:)**: Returns a derivative depth data object by mirroring or rotating it to the specified orientation.
- **converting(toDepthDataType:)**: Returns a derivative depth data object by converting the depth data map to the specified data type.
- **replacingDepthDataMap(with:)**: Returns a derivative depth data object by replacing the depth data map.
